name: [Beta] Re-Memory
description:
An interactive, game-like experience inspired by Trinh Minh-Ha's Forgetting Vietnam (2016).  Created by Benjamine Mo and submitted as a final project contribution for the course CSER3947: Transpacific Media Cultures.

To Play:

Move about using your arrow keys. Advance through dialogue using your space bar. To speak to characters, namely the spectral guide (a shadowy, waving figure) and spirits (in the form of blinking eyes), approach and attempt to 'walk' onto their respective tiles; this will prompt their dialogue. To advance to the next sequence, find portals indicated by bullseyes. Some areas are off-limits to you and will be cordoned off using invisible walls. Generally speaking, stick to the water--this will be your medium.
